input: I beg you to greet my most diligent guest Mr. Pellican along with all your colleagues in my words.
Please greet all your colleagues with my words in the Lord.
Greet my mother and wife with my words, along with the entire family.
predicted_receiver: my mother, my wife, the entire family

input: Greet all the brothers for me; I ask all the Lord that they may be well in Him.
Greet your wife, mother, sons and daughters, and especially my Christopher.
Farewell, greetings to your mother, wife and entire family.
predicted_receiver: your mother, wife and entire family.

input: After you have greeted in my words the best and most distinguished men Pellican_8127, Leon_1753, Theodore_8171, Megander_8412 and your other administrators; recommend me as you can dutifully; but especially greet your most holy wife, whom along with my brother and sister, I command you to greet warmly in Christ and who commend themselves to you as Christians. March 10, 1540.
predicted_receiver: Pellican_8127, Leon_1753, Theodore_8171, Megander_8412, your other administrators, your most holy wife

input: Those sent to us from Zurich send their greetings to you.
predicted_sender: Those sent to us from Zurich

input: And you will extend my greetings to your wife and your mother along with all your family.
predicted_receiver: your wife, your mother, all your family

input: Salute in my name Mr. Pellicanus_8127, Theodorus_8171, and my other most respected teachers, especially your mother and wife with all your family.
predicted_receiver: Mr. Pellicanus_8127, Theodorus_8171, my other most respected teachers, your mother, your wife, all your family

input: Please give my regards to your wife and mother, and to the entire family, as well as to your brother John, a most sincere friend.
predicted_receiver: your wife, mother, entire family, brother John

input: I greet your beloved wife a thousand times, also in the name of my family.
Many people, including Bartholomew Bertlinus_330 and my companions, send you greetings.
predicted_sender: Many people, Bartholomew Bertlinus_330, my companions

input: Please send my respectful greetings to all the brothers, Pellican, Leo, Theodore, Megander, and others whom I revere with good faith in the Lord.
predicted_receiver: all the brothers, Pellican, Leo, Theodore, Megander, others

input: Salute your mother, wife and children a thousand times for me.
Please greet your wife and mother on my behalf, and your whole family with as much warmth as possible.
predicted_receiver: your wife, your mother, your whole family

input: You will greet all brothers.
Also, please greet my excellent wife and the whole family on my behalf.
predicted_receiver: my excellent wife, the whole family

input: Please also greet for me in my name that illustrious group of learned men, those venerable elders, D. Pellicanum et D. Leonem, the most learned Bibliander, D. Megander, D. Ammianus, D. Binderus, etc.
predicted_receiver: that illustrious group of learned men, those venerable elders, D. Pellicanum et D. Leonem, the most learned Bibliander, D. Megander, D. Ammianus, D. Binderus

input: Give my regards to your wife, your mother and your entire family in my name.
predicted_receiver: your wife, your mother, your entire family

input: Greet your entire family most earnestly.
Zviccius_4079 and our German brothers with our sister Margareta_4320 tell me to greet you.
predicted_sender: Zviccius_4079, our German brothers, our sister Margareta_4320, my wife

input: My wife greets you with great affection.

Lord Audley, a notable man, servant of the king, has become your great admirer through our preaching, and he commanded that not only I greet you accurately in his words, but also if you send your son here, that he would treat him with that kindness
Extend the same greetings with my words to D. Pellican, D. Judas, D. Rhelican, D. Megander, the best and most selected men.
predicted_receiver: D. Pellican, D. Judas, D. Rhelican, D. Megander

input: My German brother Thomas_8178 and the Zvicciis_4079 order you to send them much salute and they beseech and implore you for this same thing, which I do, in the case of Michael.
You will order your sister, my wife, to greet her with many words.
You will greet my wife, mother and children in my name.
Mr. Butler_4466  sends you his most respectful greetings, as do our young men.
You will greet your wife and mother on my behalf with your whole family.
predicted_receiver: your wife, your mother, your whole family

input: The brothers send you greetings, especially from Bohemia_18477.
Greetings in my name to your wife and your mother along with all your children.
predicted_receiver: your wife, your mother, all your children

input: Again, farewell and greet everyone, all, I say, the most beloved brothers.
predicted_receiver: everyone, all, the most beloved brothers

input: Greet all those distinguished men who labor tirelessly and with unflagging zeal in the Lord's vineyard.
predicted_receiver: all those distinguished men who labor tirelessly and with unflagging zeal in the Lord's vineyard

input: All ours greet you, especially our Zviccius_4079, who is now suffering greatly in one knee; may Christ soon restore him to us and to our church, with great fruitfulness.
Ambrosius_8055 sends you most studious greetings along with your brothers.
